collection.body:
InVision

Invision asked me to design a poster and t-shirt design around the phrase ‘Design Makes Everything Possible’. I applied each letter to a grid and modified each letter. I then accented the design by overlaying larger versions of the first letter from each word. You can purchase this t-shirt and poster over at the Invision Marketplace.
